name: WRLD
description:
WRLD game was made for Ludum Dare 38, the topic was "A Small World".

The goal of WRLD was to have the player on a small, looping world with a limited number of resources. The player has to become self-sufficient on the planet.

Controls:

A / D - Left / Right

Space - Jump

Left Click - Interact / Attack

Right Click - Pick up (animal)

Scroll - Change hotbar item

Q - Inventory

Release 0.8.1 Bug Fixes

* Fixed walking animations

* Fixed a bug with the play button's physic model

* Fixed stacking bug

Current bugs / shortcomings :

* When the world loops stumps don't update

* Need to optimize textures

* Scaling error with items going directly to inventory
